entry.en: Clever Nuu must know them all!
Wings that beat, legs that crawl...
entry.zh: 振翅的飞者，爬行的走兽……

entry.en: In waters deep and caverns tall...
Mark of circle, mark of death...
The road behind us, all dangers passed...
Darn it. Stitch it. Make it whole...
To hide... To nest... To live...
None may die! None may die!
Chase the prey fled in fear...
For order brought, by claw and blade!
Words that only we may speak...
May Pharloom’s pins gleam bright for all!
entry.zh: 愿纺络的刺针永耀众生！

entry.en: Now none to resist... But us...

entry.zh: 他们的阴影……我们的耻辱……

entry.en: What you got there, matey matey?
Young must eat, grow or die...
Sleep and change, have no fear...
All is mine... for me, for me!
The holy heights of the Citadel...
All are subject to my rule!
We fleas together... Till final bells...
entry.zh: 跳蚤同心……直至终末钟响……

entry.en: The flurried dance of blades swung swift...
Songs that only we may sing!
May I rise... May I rise...
Grow bigger, bigger, oh so big...
Fill your belly with lovely eggs!
Live or die, make them proud!
We will climb! Climb! Climb forever!
There is no pain, nor fear, nor death...
Strength from her. Strength for her...
What was will not be forgotten...
For you, holy mother... all for you...
entry.zh: 献予您，圣母……一切献予您……

entry.en: For order brought by claw and blade...
Fix the fabric. Roll the hem...

entry.zh: 你们的救星……英雄特罗比奥！

entry.en: Carve it! Sear it! Stew it!
Is this enough? Is it ever enough?
I know it! I swear it!
A little more... ‘tis all I need...
Our ritual, needed more than ever...
entry.zh: 此刻比任何时候都需要仪式……

entry.en: Face the darkness, sing dear friends...
This world may fall, but we stand till the last...
entry.zh: 世界将倾，我们坚守至终……

entry.en: Dance and play, as all fleas past...
This time of fleas spent warm, together...
That I may know your masks bold...
That I may see your claws sharp...

entry.zh: 虔诚的信徒啊……我们失败了吗？

entry.en: Holy words for us to speak!
We live and die and roam as one!
Breathe it deep, dark burning air...
Stone will break and steel shall rust...
entry.zh: 顽石终究会碎，钢铁必然会锈……

entry.en: All blades honed perfect as can be!
What you got is mine, my love!
Mend the tears and twine the thread...
Only a little... Only a spark...
Only our duty... Only our claws...
My soul... my shell. For you!
entry.zh: 献上心脏，奉上甲壳，都为了你。

entry.en: Break the stone, seek the ore...
One final clash... one final gift...

entry.zh: 遥远的黑暗，刺目的鲜红……

entry.en: Hunt the weak, devour the dead!
Scars and cracks and stolen lives...
entry.zh: 伤痕与裂缝，夺走的生命……
先祖的回响，轰鸣的呼喊！
我们的土地！他们的坟墓！

entry.en: Why was I born in the filth?
Swim and sing, ease stiffened shells...
Lies and truths must be discussed...
This place... hidden from holy light...
The secret... I’ll learn it yet...
When you’re hungry, eat and eat!
Let fate’s bindings choke you away!
We take it if we want!
For life... its beat, its flow...
For our song, the precious Silk!
Our wish, this one last grand endeavour...
The gift, of strength and Silk...
Gather what you can! Sweet gifts!
Hear our voices! Hear our plea!
entry.zh: 听我们的声音！我们的请求！……

entry.en: Pry apart the jaws of fate!
Nothing left but dust to sell...

entry.zh: 唯有吾等，独面苍白之光……

entry.en: We’ll work and serve until we fall...
All must toil... all must eat...
None else can see the truth...
We will serve! All will serve!
You! You! You are the sinner!
All must gather! All must sing!
We live and die and roam as one!

entry.zh: 连此处也染上丝缚之咒……

entry.en: What they got I’ll take, my love!
entry.zh: 他们的我会拿走，宝贝儿！

entry.en: None may rest or idly lie...
Free me from this fading fate...
Spin and spin. Forget the dead...
Raise me higher! Pull me closer!
I will not fade! I will not take!
entry.zh: 但我不会消失！不是负担！……

entry.en: See me cut! See me serve!
entry.zh: 看我的利刃！看我的忠诚！……

entry.en: For shoot, and sheath, and blade...
For life... its beat, its flow...

entry.zh: 自荒芜而来，自黑暗而来……

entry.en: Secret songs for us to keep!
At world’s dim end, we met...
We are blessed! We are chosen!
For their sake, fight fiercely on!
To live eternal... in the light...
All fleas must gather, now or never...
These caves quake black, and shake, and groan...
The ritual calls, before the end...
Our home found safe, so briefly known...
Knock me on the head, old girl!
The ritual beckons... the road is long...
Caps and shells may fall to dust...
To sit, to rest... to stop...
Watch the darkness, hear the bells...
My rings ready... for you all...
Find the glint... Seek the gleam...
We are chosen! All are chosen!
An order lost of maidens fair...
You are the best of us!
Raise my shell! Pull me closer!
I remember you... My sisters passed...
entry.zh: 我记得你们……逝去的姊妹……

entry.en: The flea of fleas, oh yes!

entry.zh: 长久守望……清晰记录……铭记……

entry.en: You were the finest... bravest... caste...
entry.zh: 你们是最精锐……最勇毅的……

entry.en: Joy and merry till it all ends...
How did it escape the Citadel’s sight?
Seek the shine... find the ore...
A noble end is all we seek!
Soon... the ritual, bold, loud, strong!

entry.zh: 神圣的寂静……吞没我们的耻辱……

entry.en: What I take is what I got!

entry.zh: 流淌的毒液……暗藏的利爪……

entry.en: What I got is mine, my love!
The light! The heat! The glory!
Bring it now, bring it now!

entry.zh: 是否还有隐秘……在更深处？

entry.en: To leap, and run, and slay!
By our claws, none but us now!
